description:
Tendou Karen has been out-of-it ever since Chiaki and Keita have become friends. She runs into Keita in town, and so they go on a "walk" together.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: INTERMISSION 天道花憐とスランプ・デイズ
Intermission: Karen Tendo and Slump Days
Intermission: Tendou Karen to Slump Days
